title: Timeline Consequence Type Schema
description: Standardized enumeration of outcome types that follow from significant events in The Shadow Team Chronicles universe.

descriptions.description: Detailed explanations of each consequence type (not part of the enum, provided for documentation)

immediate_aftermath.description: Direct and prompt results occurring in the short term following an event.

delayed_reaction.description: Effects that emerge after a notable time lag from the triggering event.

cascading_effect.description: A sequence of secondary and tertiary consequences that flow from the initial impact.

systemic_transformation.description: Fundamental changes to established structures, systems, or institutions.

paradigm_shift.description: Radical change in foundational ideas, perspectives, or ways of understanding.

power_realignment.description: Redistribution of influence, authority, or control between different entities.

cultural_impact.description: Effects on collective values, practices, expressions, or social norms.

technological_advancement.description: Development or application of new tools, techniques, or scientific capabilities.

resource_redistribution.description: Changes in how valuable materials, assets, or opportunities are allocated.

social_movement.description: Organized collective action emerging in response to an event or condition.

knowledge_revelation.description: Discovery, disclosure, or wider recognition of previously unknown information.

martial_outcome.description: Results related to military actions, security operations, or physical conflicts.

environmental_change.description: Alterations to physical surroundings, ecosystems, or habitable spaces.

policy_reform.description: Modifications to official rules, procedures, laws, or governance approaches.

collective_trauma.description: Shared psychological impact affecting group identity, memory, or behavior.

ideological_reinforcement.description: Strengthening of existing belief systems, worldviews, or philosophical frameworks.

ideological_challenge.description: Questioning or undermining of established belief systems or worldviews.

precedent_establishment.description: Creating a model or standard that influences how future similar situations are handled.

mythology_formation.description: Development of narratives, symbols, or cultural stories that frame understanding of the event.

timeframeMapping.description: Classification of consequence types by typical timeframe (not part of the enum, provided for documentation)

short_term.description: Consequences typically manifesting within days or weeks of the event

medium_term.description: Consequences typically developing over months or a few years

long_term.description: Consequences that may take years or decades to fully manifest

multi_phase.description: Consequences that unfold in distinct stages across different timeframes
